author: Staff Reporter
text: Director General of Police (Law and Order) Ashok Kumar inaugurated the Coimbatore City Police Mineral Water Plant at the Police Recruits School Ground on the Avinashi Road, on Wednesday. The plant established at a cost of about Rs. 4.5 lakh would provide water at a subsidised rate for police personnel as part of the welfare measures of the department. Water is priced at Rs. 4 for a 300 ml bottle, Rs. 7 for a one litre bottle and Rs. 5 for refilling a 20 litre can. Water will not be sold to outsiders.
title: Mineral water unit established
